name: Smooch Sans
description: Smooch Sans was originally designed as a truncated font to be used to compliment the Smooch brush script file. It has been updated with an extensive character set and designed as a Variable font to a offer nine weight variations of this clean sans font. It comes with Latin Character sets including Western, Central, and Vietnamese language support. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/smooch-sans .
author: Robert Leuschke
